# `<dso-scrollable>`

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Events

| Event          | Description                                                 | Type                             |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| `dsoScrollEnd` | Event emitted when the scrollbar has reached top or bottom. | `CustomEvent<DsoScrollEndEvent>` |


## Methods

### `_setScrollState() => Promise<void>`

Internal method. Do not use.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
